desc: This premier day spa features a variety of healing and relaxing massages, facials and body treatments. All services are completely customized to clients’ needs, using only the highest quality brand name products.
This spa offers traditional services such as Swedish massage, facials, body wraps, mud baths, manicures and pedicures, along with whirlpools, saunas, steam and misting rooms, and dipping pools.

website: Four Seasons Hotel Silicon Valley Spa
place: Four Seasons Hotel Silicon Valley Spa
desc: Choose from a wide range of massages, including Thai, Shiatsu, hot stone and deep-tissue; regenerating facials; soothing body scrubs and exfoliations; and a range of relaxing nail treatments.

Located adjacent to the Oceano Hotel, this spa is a fountain of rejuvenation by the sea. Take to the waters and relax in traditional deep-soaking tubs, treat yourself to a decadent facial, or indulge in a variety of healing massage therapies.
Stop in for classic and intensive facial treatments such as the Acupuncture Facial Rejuvenation; Lomi Lomi, a rhythmic Hawaiian massage treatment; or the Detoxifying Sea Mineral Wrap.

Located at the Rosewood Sand Hill hotel, this tranquil sanctuary offers a range of massages, facials and body therapies, with products drawn from the region’s fresh herbs, plants, fruits and minerals.

With an ocean-side setting, this spa’s selection of state-of-the-art, advanced facials, massages, body wraps, peels and scrubs include maternity spa treatments as well as a special selection of Carita beauty treatments.

Wash away your tensions with natural healing and rejuvenating therapies such as a Zen Harmony Accupressure Facial, a hot stone massage or a detoxifying Moortherapy Mud treatment. Private hot tub rooms with steam or sauna are also offered.
